pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tapioca provides an easy way to make explorable Python API wrappers.APIs wrapped by Tapioca follow a simple interaction pattern that works uniformly so developers don't need to learn how to use a new coding interface/style for each service API.Source code hosted on Github: https://github.com/vintasoftware/tapioca-wrapperDocumentation hosted by Readthedocs: http://tapioca-wrapper.readthedocs.io/en/stable/
